attributes.name: action
attributes.desc: required, request URL

attributes.name: headers
attributes.desc: request headers

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.desc: whether uploading multiple files is permitted

attributes.name: data
attributes.desc: additions options of request

attributes.name: name
attributes.desc: key name for uploaded file

attributes.name: with-credentials
attributes.desc: whether cookies are sent

attributes.name: show-file-list
attributes.desc: whether to show the uploaded file list

attributes.name: drag
attributes.desc: whether to activate drag and drop mode

attributes.name: accept
attributes.desc: accepted file types, will not work when thumbnail-mode is true

attributes.name: on-preview
attributes.desc: hook function when clicking the uploaded files

attributes.name: on-remove
attributes.desc: hook function when files are removed

attributes.name: on-success
attributes.desc: hook function when uploaded successfully

attributes.name: on-error
attributes.desc: hook function when some errors occurs

attributes.name: on-progress
attributes.desc: hook function when some progress occurs

attributes.name: on-change
attributes.desc: hook function when select file or upload file success or upload file fail

attributes.name: before-upload
attributes.desc: hook function before uploading with the file to be uploaded as its parameter. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, uploading will be aborted

attributes.name: before-remove
attributes.desc: hook function before removing a file with the file and file list as its parameters. If `false` is returned or a `Promise` is returned and then is rejected, removing will be aborted.

attributes.name: thumbnail-mode
attributes.desc: whether thumbnail is displayed

attributes.name: file-list
attributes.desc: default uploaded files, e.g. [{name: 'food.jpg', url: 'https://xxx.cdn.com/xxx.jpg'}]

attributes.name: list-type
attributes.desc: type of fileList

attributes.name: auto-upload
attributes.desc: whether to auto upload file

attributes.name: http-request
attributes.desc: override default xhr behavior, allowing you to implement your own upload-file's request

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.desc: whether to disable upload

attributes.name: limit
attributes.desc: maximum number of uploads allowed

attributes.name: on-exceed
attributes.desc: hook function when limit is exceeded

methods.name: clearFiles
methods.desc: clear the uploaded file list (this method is not supported in the `before-upload` hook)
